rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Spacious area with colonial style decor. Features comfortable seating and built-in storage units. Serves as the central hub for family gatherings.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Dining Area
rooms.description: An integrated open-plan kitchen adjoining a dining area, designed with colonial aesthetics and ample storage. Equipped with modern fixtures and easy access to the living room.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom designed in a colonial style for the primary occupant, featuring an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet. Positioned to maximize natural light and adhere to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room with colonial elegance. Includes built-in storage and a seating area. Located strategically for privacy while maintaining ease of access.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed in colonial style ensuring ample space and natural light. Adheres to Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom following colonial design principles, with sufficient storage and ventilation in compliance with local building norms.

rooms.name: Home Theater / Multipurpose Room
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment space featuring soundproofing and comfortable seating. Designed to accommodate a home theater setup with modern technology in a colonial aesthetic.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom for Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious ensuite bathroom designed with colonial details and functional layout. Includes a bathtub or shower area as per local norms.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Grand entrance with colonial detailing, providing ample natural light and ventilation. Complies with local building codes and Vastu principles.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Functional entry for service staff, ensuring ease of access while maintaining the overall aesthetics and security.

openings.name: Garage Entry
openings.description: Designated entrance for vehicles, incorporating colonial design elements and local building norms.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: A balcony area integrated with the living room to provide an outdoor relaxation space, adhering to Vastu guidelines for open spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Luxurious master bedroom on the first floor with a private terrace view, designed in colonial style and adhering to Vastu principles for energy flow.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest bedroom on the first floor with ample storage space and access to a small balcony or terrace area. Designed in colonial style following local norms.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the first floor offering comfortable living space with natural light and ventilation, designed to meet Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bedroom 4
rooms.description: Cozy bedroom on the upper level ensuring privacy and comfort, with colonial detailing and efficient space planning following local building norms.

openings.name: Main Staircase
openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting ground and first floors with colonial detailing, ensuring safety and adherence to local building codes.

openings.name: Balcony / Terrace Access
openings.description: Access points leading to private balconies/terraces providing outdoor views and ventilation, designed in accordance with Vastu principles.
